challenges.title: Q1: Styled Heading & Paragraph
challenges.description: Create a heading and a paragraph. Use CSS to make the heading blue and center aligned, and the paragraph with a gray text color and font-size 18px.
examples: Use a <style> tag in <head> or an external stylesheet.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>CSS Basics</title>
    <style>
        /* Add your CSS here */
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Add heading and paragraph here -->
</body>
</html>

challenges.title: Q2: Button with Class
challenges.description: Create a button with class 'primary-btn'. Style it using CSS to have a background color, white text, some padding, and rounded corners.
examples: Use .primary-btn selector and properties like padding, border-radius.
challenges.starterCode:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
    <meta charset="UTF-8">
    <title>Button Styling</title>
    <style>
        /* Style .primary-btn here */
    </style>
</head>
<body>
    <!-- Add your button with class="primary-btn" -->
</body>
</html>
